content.query:
USE nyc_green_taxi_discovery

SELECT MIN(total_amount) as min_total_amount,
       MAX(total_amount) as max_total_amount,
       AVG(total_amount) as avg_total_amount,
       COUNT(1) as total_number_of_records,
       COUNT(total_amount) as not_null_number_of_records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_green_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
   AS trip_data_green_parquet;


SELECT payment_type,COUNT(1) as number_of_records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_green_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
   AS trip_data_green_parquet
   GROUP BY payment_type;
